#GWAS simulations - results


###Heritability

```{r Figure 1}

Fig1 <- ggplot(h1,aes(x = (H2)))+
          geom_density(fill = "orange",alpha = 0.4)+
          facet_grid(factor(Nids)~factor(Nsnps),scales = "free_y")+
          geom_vline(aes(xintercept = (0.4)),lty = 2)+
          theme_bw()+
          xlab("Heritability estimates")+
          ylab("Density")

Fig1


```

###GWAS - Number of QTL detected

```{r Figure 2}

Fig2 <- subset(g1,SNP.Name %in% paste0("Q",c(1:10))) %>%
        ddply(
              .(Nids,Nsnps,HistN,Full.Iteration.ID),
              summarise,
              N_Sig_QTL = sum(Sig.Corrected == "yes")
              ) %>%
        ggplot(
             aes(x = N_Sig_QTL)
             )+
            geom_density(fill = "orange",alpha = 0.4,adjust = 1.5)+
            xlim(c(0,12))+
            facet_grid(factor(Nids)~factor(Nsnps))+
            geom_vline(aes(xintercept = 10),lty = 2)+
            theme_bw()

Fig2


```
**Figure 2** Density blah blah

\pagebreak
